subject: designed ParallelComputer Surefire plugin
msgSnippet: We wrote a ParallelComputer which is runninf test classes and methods in parallel. This is the public available pull request in Junit:
messageBody:
We wrote a ParallelComputer which is runninf test classes and methods in parallel.

This is the public available pull request in Junit:
https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/pull/523

Can you please comment on the Javadoc if you understand it and you would be able to use it (especially in surefire plugin)?

Public available source code:
https://github.com/Tibor17/junit/blob/31515e7bafc9fd38d8d9ff7c70e6bd7056a2cf52/src/main/java/org/junit/experimental/ParallelComputer.java

Thx, Tibor
